body:
Hey!
I went to Africa to help people there build homes, and help out in general.
Do you know what that did for gaming for me?
-hahahahhahahha screw top 1000 players
-whats that now???
-when did he do that???
-Who is that?
-peachy= charmander guy?
-26 days of ZERO minecraft, IPhone, or media in general.

BENEFITS:
-People in africa have food, water, and a porta potty
-I got to 'unplug' from the outside world
-Now I have been to every settled continent (all 6) (antarctica=no)
-I get to think

Oh and remember when I said no media in general?
well I had a nice camera....
BUT A TRUCK RAN IT OVER
Don't ask.
But anyway.  I am back.
Or am I?......

title: My Absence

replies.body:
Welcome back! Hopefully you had a terrific time!
It's great to take a nice long break from technology and really get a taste of the real world.
